website_summaries.verdict: Popular gloves by a trusted brand that are versatile, comfortable, and crafted to last through numerous winter seasons.
pros: Well-made North Face gloves with Etip tech fingers that make controlling your favorite devices while wearing them easy
Flexible, and can be worn with liners
cons: May not keep your hands warm in very cold conditions
Sizes run slightly large for some wearers

customer_reviews.title: Not for colder weather
customer_reviews.text: This ones are not for colder weather. You have been advised don’t waste your money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: not for colder climates
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look nice and fit well, but they are not good for very cold weather (January in New York State). This information wasn't listed in the product description. Wish I had remembered to look for a degree of warmth before paying for these pricey gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ekam

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's Beware
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm glove. Fits like ... a glove. 🤡 Tips and stitching start to come loose after one season. Wish it had better construction as it is meant for winter.
customer_reviews.author: FAFSA

customer_reviews.title: Works good on the phone. And has good grips to not drop it.
customer_reviews.text: My previous 3 season North face glove were warmer and not as tight. These fit like a glove but very snug. Works great for the phone but I really didn't care about that. I just wanted 3 season gloves but could not find any without e tips. $45 is alot of money.
customer_reviews.author: cathy smith

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I lost a glove in a parking lot, and wanted to replace them. These are great gloves. I used to use them for warmth in winter. Now I'm using them for shopping, due to coronavirus. They're easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect e-tip gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these gloves! So much that this is now my 4th pair. They fit perfectly and work great with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great when you're not playing in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are amazing and work well when trying to type on your phone. I went to Canada in freezing cold weather and they held up fine! Only found my hands getting cold when I played too much with snow. Overall, a great pair of gloves and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. They fit so well and I can use my mobile device with them which is a plus. Not great for playing out in the snow though, but great for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, flexible and phone friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. They are flexible allowing me to keto turn on while buttoning, zipping or tying my shoes. I am able to use my phone with them on. Keeps my hands nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ehlenfeldt

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves good dexterity
customer_reviews.text: I love these gloves. This is my third pair. I’m hard on gloves
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: WARM IN FREEZING WEATHER
customer_reviews.text: Made me hands warm in -22 weather!!! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Alyssia Stock

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gloves ever. They fit great. They will last forever unless you loose one like I did. Thank goodness they still sell the same style.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are warm and amazing to drive with. Upstate Ny gets cold. I love the snap feature so one globe doesn’t get lost. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cutaia

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these gloves. They are comfortable, warm and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that I can keep the gloves on to use my cell phone. Previous pair wore out from use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

product_meta.title: The North Face Women's Etip Glove
feature_bullets: Update us all on your next adventure with The North Face® Etip™ Gloves.
Etip thumb and index finger allow for phone or MP3 player operation.
The North Face® branding on the front.
Extra silicone gripping on the palm.
Lock clip system for easy storage. 100% polyester. Spot clean. Imported.
